metadata.displayName: Status if Windows Defender is not available on machine
metadata.description: Windows Defender Exploit Guard is only available starting with Windows 10/Windows Server with update 1709. Setting this value to 'Non-Compliant' shows machines with older versions on which Windows Defender Exploit Guard is not available (such as Windows Server 2012 R2) as non-compliant. Setting this value to 'Compliant' shows these machines as compliant.

metadata.displayName: Enforce password history via Windows machines should meet requirements for 'Security Settings - Account Policies'
metadata.description: Specifies limits on password reuse - how many times a new password must be created for a user account before the password can be repeated.

metadata.displayName: Maximum password age via Windows machines should meet requirements for 'Security Settings - Account Policies'
metadata.description: Specifies the maximum number of days that may elapse before a user account password must be changed. The format of the value is two integers separated by a comma, denoting an inclusive range.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password age via Windows machines should meet requirements for 'Security Settings - Account Policies'
metadata.description: Specifies the minimum number of days that must elapse before a user account password can be changed.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password length via Windows machines should meet requirements for 'Security Settings - Account Policies'
metadata.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters that a user account password may contain.

metadata.displayName: Password must meet complexity requirements
metadata.description: Specifies whether a user account password must be complex. If required, a complex password must not contain part of  user's account name or full name; be at least 6 characters long; contain a mix of uppercase, lowercase, number, and non-alphabetic characters.

metadata.displayName: Effect via PrivateLinkEnabled_Audit
metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Key Vaults should use private link
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Storage account encryption scopes should use customer-managed keys to encrypt data at rest
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure AI Services resources should restrict network access
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: VPN gateways should use only Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) authentication for point-to-site users
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: SQL servers on machines should have vulnerability findings resolved
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Application Insights components should block log ingestion and querying from public networks
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Include Arc connected servers via Should Use Private Endpoint
metadata.description: By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password length via Audit Windows machines that do not restrict the minimum password length to specified number of characters
metadata.description: The Minimum password length setting determines the least number of characters that can make up a password for a user account.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Audit Windows machines that do not restrict the minimum password length to specified number of characters
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Include Arc connected servers via WindowsPasswordLength_AINE
metadata.description: By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: Minimum password age via Audit Windows machines that do not have the minimum password age set to specified number of days
metadata.description: The Minimum password age setting determines the period of time (in days) that a password must be used before the user can change it.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Audit Windows machines that do not have the minimum password age set to specified number of days
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: The maximum validity in months
metadata.description: The limit to how long a certificate may be valid for. Certificates with lengthy validity periods aren't best practice.

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Certificates should have the specified maximum validity period
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: IP firewall rules on Azure Synapse workspaces should be removed
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Network traffic data collection agent should be installed on Windows virtual machines
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope via WindowsMinimumPassword_AINE
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope via Dependency agent should be enabled in virtual machine scale sets for listed virtual machine images
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Dependency agent should be enabled in virtual machine scale sets for listed virtual machine images
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Recovery Services vaults should use private link for backup
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: Azure Defender for SQL should be enabled for unprotected SQL Managed Instances
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects

metadata.displayName: Effect for policy: A vulnerability assessment solution should be enabled on your virtual machines
metadata.description: For more information about effects, visit https://aka.ms/policyeffects
